trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta una raccolta di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" />.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection> object contains a set of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn> objects that are typically used to define the columns of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> object.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection> oggetto contiene un set di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn> gli oggetti che sono in genere utilizzati per definire le colonne di una <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A> that defines the layout of data in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> Ã¨ un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A> che definisce il layout dei dati in un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> controllo.

trans-unit.source: To receive notification of changes in the collection, monitor the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.CollectionChanged> event that is inherited from <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: Per ricevere la notifica delle modifiche nella raccolta, controllare il <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.CollectionChanged> evento che viene ereditata da <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza un'istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Removes all of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" /> objects from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove tutti gli oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" /> da <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The position to place the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" />.
trans-unit.target: Posizione in cui inserire il nuovo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" /> to insert.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" /> da inserire.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" /> to the collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" /> all'insieme in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: This method creates a new item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection> without replacing another item.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo crea un nuovo elemento nel <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection> senza sostituire un altro elemento.

trans-unit.source: To replace an item in the collection with a new item, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection.SetItem%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per sostituire un elemento nella raccolta con un nuovo elemento, utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection.SetItem%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: The original position of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" />.
trans-unit.target: Posizione originale di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" />.

trans-unit.source: The new position of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" />.
trans-unit.target: Nuova posizione di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" />.

trans-unit.source: Changes the position of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" /> in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Modifica la posizione di un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" /> nell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: The event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Argomenti dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection`1.CollectionChanged" /> event when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection" /> changes.
trans-unit.target: Genera l'evento <see cref="E:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection`1.CollectionChanged" /> quando viene modificato <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The position of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" /> to remove.
trans-unit.target: Posizione dellâoggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" /> da rimuovere.

trans-unit.source: Removes a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" /> from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection" /> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" /> da <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection" /> in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: The position at which the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" /> replaces the old <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" />.
trans-unit.target: Posizione in cui il nuovo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" /> sostituisce lâoggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" /> precedente.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" /> to place at the specified position.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" /> da sostituire in corrispondenza della posizione specificata.

trans-unit.source: Replaces the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" /> that is at the specified index with another <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" />.
trans-unit.target: Sostituisce l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" /> in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato con un altro oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" />.

trans-unit.source: This method replaces a column in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection> with a new column.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo sostituisce una colonna di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection> con una nuova colonna.

trans-unit.source: To insert a new column without replacing another column, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection.InsertItem%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per inserire una nuova colonna senza sostituire un'altra colonna, utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection.InsertItem%2A> metodo.
